channel.title: [PI]Kalphite Queen doesnt respawn[Erasedpkz]
channel.description:
ive searched through some of the codes they all looked fine, but my Kq just doesnt respawn.
I have absolutely no clue how this is possible
Any idea's / suggestions? any help would be appreciated

item.title: [PI]Kalphite Queen doesnt respawn[Erasedpkz]
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

[quote=“I InDrEk I, post:6, topic:401784”]Isnt it uncommented in code…?

/*if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158){ handleKalpite(i); }*/
Replace with:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158){ handleKalpite(i); }[/quote]

uh, oops, ofcourse -_-

i kind of deleted my Kalpite(i)

item.title: [PI]Kalphite Queen doesnt respawn[Erasedpkz]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“x pk3r xx, post:3, topic:401784”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=498842.msg3648045#msg3648045 date=1309534712]

ive searched through some of the codes they all looked fine, but my Kq just doesnt respawn.

I have absolutely no clue how this is possible

Any idea’s / suggestions? any help would be appreciated

Did you waited long enough? else try to add in your npchandler.java to add if(npctype == ###){ spawnnpc(###,###, ###, #); }
or something like that. (The code I give is far from the right one but to give you an idea.)
[/quote]

I waited for ages just to be sure.

This is my “respawn code”

[CODE] /if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158){
handleKalpite(i);
}/

				} else if (npcs[i] != null && npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].applyDead == true &&  npcs[i].needRespawn == false) {
					//if (npcs[i] != null) {
					npcs[i].needRespawn = true;
					npcs[i].actionTimer = getRespawnTime(i); // respawn time
					dropItems(i); // npc drops items!
					appendSlayerExperience(i);
					//appendKillCount(i);
					npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX;
					npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY;				
					npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP;
					npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328;
					npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
					npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;
					if (npcs[i].npcType >= 2440 && npcs[i].npcType <= 2446) {
						Server.objectManager.removeObject(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY);
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
						handleJadDeath(i);
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 3491) {
						handleRFDDeath(i);
					}
					
					if (npcs[i] != null && npcs[i].npcType != 1158){
						if (!npcs[i].needRespawn){
							npcs[i] = null;
							for (int j = 1; j < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; j++) {
								if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
									Server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
								}
							}
							continue;
						}
						npcs[i].needRespawn = true;
						npcs[i].actionTimer = 30;
						npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX;
						npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY;
					} else if (npcs[i] != null && npcs[i].npcType == 1158) {
						npcs[i] = null;
						for (int j = 1; j < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; j++) {
							if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null){
								Server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
							}
						}
					}
					
				} else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].needRespawn == true) {					
					if(npcs[i].spawnedBy > 0) {
						npcs[i] = null;
					} else {
						/*if (npcs[i].actionTimer <= 0 && npcs[i].needRespawn && npcs[i].NeedsRespawn) {
						for (int j = 1; j < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; j++) {
							if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
								Server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
							}
						}*/
							int type = npcs[i].npcType;
							if (type == 1160)
								type = 1158;
							int x = npcs[i].makeX;
							int y = npcs[i].makeY;
							int height = npcs[i].heightLevel;
							int walk = npcs[i].walkingType;
							int mHp = npcs[i].MaxHP;
							int mHit = npcs[i].maxHit;
							int attack = npcs[i].attack;	
							int defence = npcs[i].defence;
							
							npcs[i] = null;
							newNPC(type, x, y, height, walk, mHp, mHit, attack, defence);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}[/CODE]

I noticed there are some slashes in there, but when i take em away it just gives me 100 errors compiling.[/quote]
Oh, well uhm. I see there are much ints like respawntime, etc…
Try to look at them and change them if needed. I’m sorry i don’t know more about pi servers.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Kalphite Queen doesnt respawn[Erasedpkz]
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:401784”][quote author=x pk3r xx link=topic=498842.msg3647922#msg3647922 date=1309525576]
ive searched through some of the codes they all looked fine, but my Kq just doesnt respawn.

I have absolutely no clue how this is possible

Any idea’s / suggestions? any help would be appreciated
[/quote]
Did you waited long enough? else try to add in your npchandler.java to add if(npctype == ###){ spawnnpc(###,###, ###, #); }
or something like that. (The code I give is far from the right one but to give you an idea.)[/quote]

I waited for ages just to be sure.

This is my “respawn code”

[CODE] /if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158){
handleKalpite(i);
}/

				} else if (npcs[i] != null && npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].applyDead == true &&  npcs[i].needRespawn == false) {
					//if (npcs[i] != null) {
					npcs[i].needRespawn = true;
					npcs[i].actionTimer = getRespawnTime(i); // respawn time
					dropItems(i); // npc drops items!
					appendSlayerExperience(i);
					//appendKillCount(i);
					npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX;
					npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY;				
					npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP;
					npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328;
					npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
					npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;
					if (npcs[i].npcType >= 2440 && npcs[i].npcType <= 2446) {
						Server.objectManager.removeObject(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY);
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
						handleJadDeath(i);
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 3491) {
						handleRFDDeath(i);
					}
					
					if (npcs[i] != null && npcs[i].npcType != 1158){
						if (!npcs[i].needRespawn){
							npcs[i] = null;
							for (int j = 1; j < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; j++) {
								if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
									Server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
								}
							}
							continue;
						}
						npcs[i].needRespawn = true;
						npcs[i].actionTimer = 30;
						npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX;
						npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY;
					} else if (npcs[i] != null && npcs[i].npcType == 1158) {
						npcs[i] = null;
						for (int j = 1; j < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; j++) {
							if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null){
								Server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
							}
						}
					}
					
				} else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].needRespawn == true) {					
					if(npcs[i].spawnedBy > 0) {
						npcs[i] = null;
					} else {
						/*if (npcs[i].actionTimer <= 0 && npcs[i].needRespawn && npcs[i].NeedsRespawn) {
						for (int j = 1; j < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; j++) {
							if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
								Server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
							}
						}*/
							int type = npcs[i].npcType;
							if (type == 1160)
								type = 1158;
							int x = npcs[i].makeX;
							int y = npcs[i].makeY;
							int height = npcs[i].heightLevel;
							int walk = npcs[i].walkingType;
							int mHp = npcs[i].MaxHP;
							int mHit = npcs[i].maxHit;
							int attack = npcs[i].attack;	
							int defence = npcs[i].defence;
							
							npcs[i] = null;
							newNPC(type, x, y, height, walk, mHp, mHit, attack, defence);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}[/CODE]

I noticed there are some slashes in there, but when i take em away it just gives me 100 errors compiling.
